headline: Meta & UFC partner, Nintendo Switch 2: Trending Tickers
summary: Julie Hyman and Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Alexandra Canal outline what's driving interest in the trending tickers on Yahoo Finance's platform, including a partnership between Meta Platforms (META) and TKO's (TKO) UFC, as well as Nintendo's (NTDOY) new Switch 2. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: UFC® Announces Comprehensive Multiyear Partnership With Meta
summary: LAS VEGAS, April 02, 2025--UFC®, the world’s premier mixed martial arts organization and part of TKO Group Holdings (NYSE: TKO), today announced a multiyear partnership with Meta to leverage its leading technologies to deliver unprecedented engagement with hundreds of millions of UFC fans around the world.
